The \"Remove Duplication\" functionality: The "Remove Duplication" functionality is currently in the Beta phase. We advise exporting contacts to create a backup before initiating the process to prevent any potential data loss.

The most recent (imported/added) record: The most recent (imported/added) record will be retained, and the custom fields of all duplicates will be merged and saved with this record.
